text:
Heet: Hey guys, have you heard about the cycle thefts happening on campus recently? It's getting crazy, man.
 Onkar: Ohh yeah, it's been going around. Umm, someone even stole my friend's bike last week. It's becoming a real nuisance.
  Prince: Damn, that's messed up. I mean, we're all students here trying to focus on studies, and then we have to worry about our bikes getting stolen?
  Heet: Yeah, broo, it's a hassle. A few guys I know had their bikes disappear too. Yessir, the security needs to step up their game.
  Onkar: Totally agree, man. Shitt, it's frustrating when you can't even leave your bike parked safely. They should install more CCTV cameras or something.
  Prince: I heard they're planning to increase patrolling in the residential areas. I mean, that might help deter these thieves.
  Heet: Let's hope so, Prince. It's about time they took some serious action. Umm, have you guys been taking extra precautions with your bikes?
  Onkar: Yeah, I've started locking my bike to a more secure spot. Can't be too careful, yk?
  Heet: Niceeee, Onkar. Aightt then, let's keep an eye out.
 
  Heet: Hey guys, let's meet up at the library later today to hit the books. I mean, we've got those upcoming exams to crush.
  Onkar: Sounds good, bro. I'm down for some study sessions. Umm, we can tackle those tough subjects together.
  Prince: Yeahhh, count me in too. Library sessions are always productive. Lessgoo!
  Heet: Nice, see you guys there around 6? Aight, let's grab our notes and textbooks.
  Onkar: Perfect. I'll bring my laptop too. We might need it for research or solving practice problems.
  Prince: Great idea, Onkar. I mean, the more resources, the better. We gotta ace these exams.
  Heet: Absolutely, broo. We're aiming for the stars here. Yessir, we'll make the library our second home for the next few days.
  Onkar: You know it! Shitt, I've got some challenging chapters to go over. It's grind time.

Prince: Same here, man. I've been struggling with those calculus problems. But we'll figure it out together.
 Heet: No worries, Prince. We'll break it down step by step. Umm, let's also take short breaks to keep our minds fresh.
  Onkar: Good plan. Okayy, I'll bring some snacks to keep us fueled. Can't study on an empty stomach, right?
  Heet: Exactly, Onkar. Bro, you're the snack master. Lessgoo with those study snacks!
  Prince: Haha, sounds like a plan. I mean, let's make this study session as efficient as possible.
  Heet: Alrighty, see you guys at 6 then. Aight, let's crush it!
 
  Heet: Hey guys, we gotta get cracking on that Python project. It's due on the 17th, and you know Teena Sharma doesn't mess around.
  Onkar: Oh damn, I almost forgot about that. Umm, what are we working on again? Was it the AI chatbot model?
  Prince: Yeah, bro. We gotta create an AI model that mimics our conversations. I mean, it's a cool project but kinda challenging.
  Heet: Absolutely. Teena wants us to demonstrate natural language processing techniques. Yessir, we gotta make it realistic and responsive.
  Onkar: Alright, let's break it down. I mean, we can start by collecting our chat data and then implementing the model with NLTK.
  Prince: Good plan, Onkar. We also need to think about the user interface. Shitt, I haven't touched tkinter in ages.
  Heet: No worries, Prince. We'll figure it out together. Umm, maybe we can start with basic text generation using Markov chains?
  Onkar: Yeah, that could work. Okayy, let's divide the tasks. I'll handle the data preprocessing and model training.
  Prince: I'll work on the UI design then. Lessgoo, time to bring out my creative side.
  Heet: Sounds good, guys. I'll take care of integrating everything and testing the chatbot's functionality. Aight, let's aim to finish by tomorrow evening.
  Onkar: Yeahhh, we got this. I mean, it's gonna be a late night for us, but it'll be worth it to impress Teena.

Prince: Absolutely. Shitt, I can already imagine her reaction if we pull this off smoothly.
 Heet: Haha, let's make her proud. Alrighty, let's get to work. Python, here we come!
 
  Heet: Guys, I'm running into some issues with the data preprocessing. Umm, the dataset is messy and needs a lot of cleaning.
  Onkar: Oh man, that sounds like a pain. I mean, what kind of cleaning are we talking about?
  Heet: Well, lots of missing values, inconsistent formatting, and unnecessary characters. It's taking longer than expected to get it ready for training.
  Prince: Damn, that does sound tedious. Okayy, how can we help speed things up?
  Heet: Maybe if you guys could start drafting the UI layout, it would take some load off my plate. Yessir, I just need a bit more time to clean this data.
  Onkar: Sure thing. Lessgoo, Prince, let's brainstorm some design ideas for the chat interface.
  Prince: Alright, I'm on it. I mean, we'll keep it simple yet engaging. Shitt, I hope I remember all those tkinter commands.
  Heet: Thanks, guys. Umm, I'll keep you posted on my progress with the data. Hopefully, we can sync everything up smoothly by tonight.
  Onkar: No rush, Heet. We'll make sure the UI is ready for integration when you're done with the data prep.
  Prince: Yeahhh, teamwork makes the dream work. I mean, we're in this together, no matter what challenges come our way.
  Heet: Absolutely, Prince. Alright, back to the grind. Let's tackle this one step at a time.
  Onkar: Sure thing. Lessgoo, Prince, let's brainstorm some design ideas for the chat interface.
  Prince: Alright, I'm on it. I mean, we'll keep it simple yet engaging. Shitt, I hope I remember all those tkinter commands.
  Heet: Thanks, guys. Umm, I'll keep you posted on my progress with the data. Hopefully, we can sync everything up smoothly by tonight.
  Onkar: No rush, Heet. We'll make sure the UI is ready for integration when you're done with the data prep.

Prince: Yeahhh, teamwork makes the dream work. I mean, we're in this together, no matter what challenges come our way.
 Heet: Absolutely, Prince. Alright, back to the grind. Let's tackle this one step at a time.
 
  Heet: Guys, I had lunch at Kameng mess today. Umm, the food quality is getting worse.
  Onkar: Damnnn, really? That's disappointing.
  Prince: Let's seee, maybe it's just today. Was it the usual menu?
  Heet: Yeah, but the rice was undercooked, and the dal was too watery. Shitt, I barely finished my plate.
  Onkar: That's rough, man. I mean, they need to step up their game.
  Prince: Totally. Sadd to hear about this. We should probably start exploring other options around the campus.
  Heet: Good idea. Aight, let's make a list of alternative places we can try out this week.
  Onkar: Sounds like a plan. I mean, it's worth trying new spots if Kameng mess isn't cutting it anymore.
  Prince: Yeahhh, let's keep our options open. I'm sure we'll find better places to eat.
 
  Heet: By the way, have you guys tried that new tea stall near the Khokha gate?
  Onkar: The one with the colorful chairs? Yeah, been there once.
  Prince: Haven't checked it out yet.
  Heet: It's not bad, actually. Aight, we should go there sometime after class maybe.
  Onkar: Okayy, sounds like a plan. What about tomorrow?
  Prince: Let's seee, I'm free after 4 PM. Works for you guys??
  Heet: Yessir, I'm good with that. 
  Onkar: Nicee
 
  Heet: man, this semester is getting crazier by the day. So much to juggle!😭
  Onkar: I know, right? Assignments piling up, club meetings, and then that surprise quiz last week. Ugh!
  Prince: Shitt, tell me about it. I've got this Python project due in two days. Stress levels through the roof.
  Heet: yeahhhh, Teena Sharma's Python lab is no joke. Have you started coding for the project yet?💀
  Onkar: Barely, man. Umm, I'm stuck on the chat replication part. Any progress on your end?

Prince: Not really. I mean, the AI model part is tricky. Trying to figure out the training data set.
 Heet: damn, we should meet up at the library later. Maybe we can brainstorm some ideas together.
  Onkar: Sounds like a plan. I'll bring my laptop. Let's get this thing sorted out!
  Prince: Aight, see you guys there in an hour??😶‍🌫️
  Heet: yeah, let's make it happen. We gotta crack this before it cracks us!💀
  Onkar: Definitely. We can't afford to leave it till the last minute.
  Prince: For sure. Plus, I've got that dbms assignment due the day after. Talk about timing, right?
  Heet: ughh, double trouble. I still haven't started on my presentation for the club next week.
  Onkar: Broo, you're doing a presentation too? It's like the universe decided to throw everything at us at once.
  Prince: Tell me about it. Can't even remember the last time I had a decent meal without rushing.🤠
  Heet: the struggle is real. Sometimes I feel like we're running a marathon with no finish line in sight.
  Onkar: But hey, once we survive this, we'll be legends. Remember that time we pulled off that hackathon project?
  Prince: Ohh yeah, good times. We nailed it despite the chaos. This is just another bump in the road.
  Heet: exactly. We got this, guys. Let's grind through it and celebrate with a massive feast at the end.🥰
  Onkar: Lessgoo! Can't wait for that victory meal. But first, let's conquer these assignments and projects!
 
  Heet: yo guys, anyone up for a quick study sesh at the library tonight??
  Onkar: Yeahh, I'm down. Got that AI project looming over my head.
  Prince: Count me in too. Need to finish this econ assignment before it drives me crazy.
  Heet: nicee! Library at 9:00 PM. We'll smash through this work like pros.😎
  Onkar: Aight, see you guys there. Gotta grab some snacks first, though.
  Prince: Make it quick bro, we need all hands on deck for this grind session.
  Heet: don't worry, I'll bring the energy drinks. Let's make tonight count!👊🏿

Onkar: Lessgoo! It's go time. Catch you guys in a bit.
 Prince: Yessir! Time to crush these tasks. See you soon, fellas!
  Heet: you know it! Library takeover, here we come!
 
  Heet: wheree are y'all??
  Prince: Coming, sorry for the delay, bro.
  Onkar: Yes, almost on our way.
  Heet: guys, be quick, don't have a lott of time in our hands.🥲
  Heet: and bring laptops...
  Onkar: Reached there.
  Prince: Anyone up??
 
  Heet: sorry about that, just finished up some code. what's next? 😅
  Onkar: I'm diving into this dev problem. It's a doozy.
  Prince: Trying to debug this AI model. It's throwing errors left and right. 🤖
  Heet: alright, I'll help with the debugging. what's the issue?
  Onkar: My laptop froze again. Ugh, these late-night coding sessions...
  Prince: Think we'll make it out of here before sunrise?
  Heet: hopefully! this project's been a marathon, not a sprint. 🏃‍♂️
  Onkar: Just need to wrap this up before Teena's deadline.
  Prince: Counting down the hours till submission. ⌛
  Heet: yessir! Let's push through. 💪
 
  Heet: how much did y'all complete??💀
  Onkar: Not a lot, sadly.
  Prince: Haha same same. What do we do?
  Heet: aight, let's get going and complete it today itself, no point delaying.
  Onkar: Okay
  Prince: Today is going to be looong🥲
  Onkar: Let's just complete quickly
  Prince: Just one day bro, one day.
  Heet: lessgooo
